Reminiscences of Kim Il Sung published in U.S.
    Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The sixth volume of part 1 the anti-Japanese revolution of the reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung "With The Century" was published in the United States by a Korean in the U.S. on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Song Ki Roe, chairman of the scientific and technological committee of the federation of Koreans in the U.S. and head of the New York society for book presentation, published the book in English.

articles.title: Japan's suppression of people's thoughts protested
articles.content:
Chicken farms to be modernized
    Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- In the five Pyongyang chicken farms undergoing rapid modernization, 150 buildings for chicken breeding-one, two and five-storeyed-have been constructed.
 Concentrating on the expansion of roosts, the major project, the builders made short work of the construction of walls and insulation flooring, plastering and roofing. the completed buildings now number 46 at the Mangyongdae Chicken Farm, 41 at the Ryongsong Chicken Farm, with the rest taking shape at the Sopho, Hadang and Sungho chicken farms.    
 The construction of auxiliary buildings and the assembly of equipment are continuing.

articles.title: Japan had better know where it stands
articles.content:
Japan's suppression of people's thoughts protested
    Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The world progressives are strongly protesting with surging indignation the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the units related to an organization for the study of the Juche idea.
 As soon as the news of the Japanese authorities' brutal suppression of people's thoughts was reported, international and regional organizations, Juche idea study organizations, political and public figures and followers of the Juche idea in different countries issued statements of protest and sent letters of protest to the Japanese authorities one after another.    
 They included the "International Kim Il Sung Prize" council, the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, the Nepal Institute for Juche Studies, the Syrian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Malagasy National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Tajik National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea named after General Kim Jong Il, the Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Jong Il of Austrian Communists, the Peruvian National Association for the Study of Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Colombia, the senior adviser to the Ugandan President, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, the chairman of the Indian Committee for the Study of Juche Philosophy and the president of the Mexican Institute of the Juche Philosophy.
